summary.title: Designed for Everyday Living
summary.subtitle: A thoughtfully planned community that balances comfort, connectivity, and long-term value
summary.description: Provident Sunworth City is a thoughtfully planned 60-acre township that brings together everything your family needs for a wholesome lifestyle. With over 50 world-class amenities, lush green landscapes, and spacious 2 & 3 BHK homes, this is where memories are made and dreams come true.
